- - - Updated - - -

http://i.imgur.com/XdZJgOi.jpg The (Heavy WIP) plan for White Sands

Hey, just a question with an exact purpose.

I plan to use this alongside RSS/RO in my upcoming Space Shuttle Youtube series. Are you guys going to set up an RSS/RO version (for the specific locations)? If you're not, ok, I understand! But, I would like to be able to make use of this so things actually look better since I am making an exact replica of the Space shuttle flights, and a realistic looking KSC would go a long way to doing so!
I think that the main support is RSS/RO, but see if Tristonwilson or liquidhype have a better answer
ok! Will do!

Hey, just a question with an exact purpose.

I plan to use this alongside RSS/RO in my upcoming Space Shuttle Youtube series. Are you guys going to set up an RSS/RO version (for the specific locations)? If you're not, ok, I understand! But, I would like to be able to make use of this so things actually look better since I am making an exact replica of the Space shuttle flights, and a realistic looking KSC would go a long way to doing so!

I think that the main support is RSS/RO, but see if Tristonwilson or liquidhype have a better answer
ok! Will do!
You can grab the original Chris P. Bacon files and try that with RSS, not sure if they still work or where the download is.

Also the plan is to have a stock version and eventually do RO support.
Hey guys, sorry for the delay, I will get back to be working on LC-41 now!
ok! I'll be patient.

Hey guys, sorry for the delay, I will get back to be working on LC-41 now!

no problem take your time!!

Hey guys, sorry for the delay, I will get back to be working on LC-41 now!
Don't worry!! Make it right!! Although It's not like I know what I'm doing, you're the expert here

Take your time Karl! Don't rush!

Though I would like somewhere to launch my Titans..
